name: Cambridge (City of) - Community Development
comment:
Matches volunteers with seniors who are socially isolated, and adults with physical disabilities

Without Walls Program - Teleconferencing phone system which provides individuals with an opportunity to meet and talk with other members of the community * sessions are facilitated by a City of Cambridge staff member and include a wide range of activity and discussion topics * wow@cambridge.ca

Matches volunteers with seniors who are socially isolated, and adults with physical disabilities

Without Walls Program - Teleconferencing phone system which provides individuals with an opportunity to meet and talk with other members of the community * sessions are facilitated by a City of Cambridge staff member and include a wide range of activity and discussion topics * wow@cambridge.ca, Codes: Free, Features: Wheelchair Accessible, Languages: English, Referral: Call or email, Address: William E Pautler 50+ Recreation Centre, 1145 Concession Rd, Cambridge, ON, N3H 4L5, Location: lat: 43.3960546, lon: -80.3446178
